name: SHOOT! Tabletop Card Game
description:
SHOOT! Tabletop Card Game - Strategy

Players battle against other players in order to gain victory points that are needed to win the game. Players have different options in trying to win the game, via exchanging with the Bank, stealing from other players ,or get lucky from Events . These different tactics are available for the players in order to make the gameplay diverse as it will allow the players have multiple ways to win the game.

A board game project that created by Havoc Games .

Team : Havoc Games (3 Designers)
Role : Project Lead & Game Designer
Module : Fundamentals of Game Design
Duration : 6 Weeks
